title: Kenny Smith Interview
itunes:title: Kenny Smith Interview
description:
Today on the show we had sports commentator Kenny Smith call in where they spoke about NBA reopening, activism and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Montanna Nursing home for declining free corona virus testing and now all of the residence have the virus. Also, Angela helped listeners during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
